page.topic: How to Create a PhoneGap Shell Application
page.description: Creating a PhoneGap Shell application allows you to test changes to your application quickly without need to go through the PhoneGap build service every time you make a change.

discussion.p: In order to test mobile applications that will be deployed using a store - such as Google Play or Apple's App Store - you must publish your Alpha Anywhere application using PhoneGap. During application development, it can become a tedious process to republish your PhoneGap app using PhoneGap build every time you make a change. You can eliminate the need to republish your app using PhoneGap's build service by creating a PhoneGap Shell application.

A PhoneGap Shell is created using the UX Component. It includes the ability to dynamically load a UX Component, eliminating the need to republish your entire PhoneGap application with every change. In the videos below, we explain how to build your own PhoneGap Shell application.
